tool_description: This API allows you to create trading algorithms, data science projects, user facing applications and much more. New data is added at the start of every hour, and puth through an algorithm that returns statistical and technical indicators, along with a buy or sell signal.
name: Hourly Market Data
title: Hourly Market Data

api_list.name: GET All BNB Data
api_list.description: Get all previous data from the BNB Database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hourly-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/all/bnb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hourly-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
